gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.render

Interface IPointRenderable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Particle, Star

    public interface IPointRenderable
extends IRenderable
    Interface to be implemented by those entities that can be rendered as a single point, being it a pixel or a fuzzy point.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
